mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TB_PRODPLAN tp , TB_ITEMMST ti , TB_USERMST tu WHERE tp.ITEM_CD = ti.ITEM_CD AND tp.PRODPLAN_EMP_ID = tu.USER_ID AND tp.PRODPLAN_DT >= CONVERT (DATE, CONVERT(CHAR(10), #{prodplan_dt}, 23)) AND tp.PRODPLAN_DELETE_CHK = 0

SELECT * FROM TB_PRODPLAN tp , TB_ITEMMST ti , TB_USERMST tu WHERE tp.PRODPLAN_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND tp.PRODPLAN_NO NOT IN (SELECT tw.PRODPLAN_NO FROM TB_WORKPROD tw) AND tp.ITEM_CD = ti.ITEM_CD AND tp.PRODPLAN_EMP_ID = tu.USER_ID
SELECT * FROM TB_WORKPROD tw , TB_ITEMMST ti , TB_USERMST tu WHERE tw.ITEM_CD = ti.ITEM_CD AND tw.WORKPROD_EMP_ID = tu.USER_ID AND tw.WORKPROD_DT = #{workprod_dt} AND tw.WORKPROD_DELETE_CHK = 0

SELECT * FROM TB_WORKPROD tw , TB_ITEMMST ti , TB_USERMST tu WHERE tw.WORKPROD_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND tw.WORKPROD_DT >= CONVERT (DATE, CONVERT(CHAR(10), #{workprod_dt}, 23)) AND tw.ITEM_CD = ti.ITEM_CD AND tw.WORKPROD_EMP_ID = tu.USER_ID
SELECT * FROM TB_PROCMST tp WHERE tp.USE_FLAG = 1 AND tp.PROC_DELETE_CHK = 0
SELECT * FROM TB_WORKPROD tw , TB_ITEMMST ti , TB_USERMST tu WHERE tw.WORKPROD_NO = #{workprod_no} AND tw.WORKPROD_DELETE_CHK = 0 AND tw.ITEM_CD = ti.ITEM_CD AND tw.WORKPROD_EMP_ID = tu.USER_ID
SELECT * FROM TB_WORK_PROC twp , TB_PROCMST tp WHERE twp.WORKPROD_NO = #{workprod_no} AND twp.PROC_CD = tp.PROC_CD
SELECT * FROM TB_WORK_ITEM twi , TB_ITEMMST ti WHERE twi.WORKPROD_NO = #{workprod_no} AND twi.ITEM_CD = ti.ITEM_CD
SELECT * FROM TB_PRODPLAN tp, TB_USERMST tu , TB_ITEMMST ti WHERE tp.PRODPLAN_NO = #{prodplan_no} AND tp.PRODPLAN_EMP_ID = tu.USER_ID AND tp.ITEM_CD = ti.ITEM_CD
SELECT * FROM TB_ITEM_PROD tip , TB_ITEMMST ti WHERE tip.PRODPLAN_NO = #{prodplan_no} AND tip.ITEM_CD = ti.ITEM_CD
SELECT CONCAT('WPR', CONVERT(CHAR(6), GETDATE(), 12), (SELECT FORMAT(COUNT(tw.WORKPROD_NO) + 1, '0000') FROM TB_WORKPROD tw WHERE tw.WORKPROD_NO LIKE 'WPR'+ CONVERT(CHAR(6), GETDATE(), 12) +'%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_WORKPROD (WORKPROD_NO, WORKPROD_DT, SEQ_NO, ITEM_CD, QTY, WORK_DT, PRODPLAN_NO, WORK_CMD, REMARK, WORKPROD_EMP_ID, WORKPROD_UPDATE, WORKPROD_DELETE_CHK) VALUES ( #{workprod_no}, #{workprod_dt}, (SELECT COUNT(tw.SEQ_NO)+1 FROM TB_WORKPROD tw WHERE tw.PRODPLAN_NO = #{prodplan_no}), #{item_cd}, #{qty}, #{work_dt}, #{prodplan_no}, #{work_cmd}, #{remark}, #{workprod_emp_id}, #{workprod_update}, #{workprod_delete_chk} )
INSERT INTO TB_WORK_ITEM (WORKPROD_NO, ITEM_CD, IN_QTY) VALUES (#{workprod_no}, #{item_cd}, #{in_qty})
